services.name: Irrigation Systems
services.shortDescription: Smart watering solutions for your garden
services.description: We design and install customized irrigation systems that ensure your plants get the right amount of water at the right time. Our systems include smart controllers that adjust watering based on weather conditions.

services.name: Garden Maintenance
services.shortDescription: Keep your garden looking its best
services.description: Our comprehensive maintenance services include regular pruning, fertilization, pest control, and seasonal cleanups. We'll keep your outdoor space healthy and beautiful year-round.

services.name: Landscape Design
services.description: Our landscape designers will work with you to create a beautiful, functional outdoor space tailored to your lifestyle and preferences. From concept to completion, we handle every detail.

services.name: Vertical Gardens
services.description: Transform blank walls into lush, living artworks with our vertical garden systems. Perfect for urban spaces, these gardens improve air quality and create stunning visual impact.

services.name: Artificial Grass
services.description: Our premium artificial grass looks and feels like real turf but requires no mowing, watering, or fertilizing. Perfect for play areas, pet spaces, and drought-prone regions.

services.name: Garden Lighting
services.description: Enhance your garden's beauty and security with our professional lighting installations. We design lighting schemes that highlight your landscape's best features while providing safety and security.
